content: + media title 1 learn how to crochet the sweet scalloped bookmark in no time perfect for beginners and makes a great gift or makert item thanks for joining mgd crochet and let s learn together project notes * light or dk cotton yarn - i used cotlin by knit picks * 4 0 mm crochet hook *finished bookmark measures approximately 8 in length - excluding tassel 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=ncuscb80hiu
